channel.title: Data Journalism on My take on data
channel.description: Recent content in Data Journalism on My take on data

item.title: Why does everyone I work with have the same name? A guide on how to not pick a unique baby name in America.
item.description: I’ve taken a particular interest in names since I’m thinking of a name for my to-be-born son. I did a little digging through the Social Security Administration names database, which lists all names given to baby boys and girls in America1. I began this exercise to just get a quality list of ideas, but my curiosity got the better of me. Name Trends Since 1950 What was the most popular boy name since 1950?
